this_title: Eli Roth Presents: My Possessed Pet Season 1
introduction: Few things are more profound than the bond we share with our pets. But what if an evil presence takes hold of an animal companion and turns it against you? Owners tell terrifying tales of cherished pet relationships ripped apart by supernatural forces.Episodes include…The Night MareMaster of the HouseEight-Legged ExorcismNitro
